title: Microsoft dangerous creatures (MAC)
brief_description: Hear a twig snap underfoot. See a flash of fur race through the trees. Was that the hunter or the hunted? Get close to more than 250 of the wildest creatures on Earth through 800 detailed articles, hundreds of full-colour photographs, and hours of sound and narration - all reviewed by the World Wildlife Fund. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: any Macintosh computer that supports a 256-colour or higher resolution monitor; System 6.0.7 or later; 4 Mb of memory; at least 1 Mb avaiable hard disk space; CD-ROM drive.
